name: Elvis Presently
description:
Your workshop has been infested with "Shapely" enemies. They've caused havoc! Throwing books and presents around. Collect all 100 books and presents as you kill enemies. Kill enemies by shooting the correct shape at the enemy.

Gameplay

  • Z for Triangle, X for Circle, C for Box. 
  • Oishi, the elf, runs on his own. 
  • Press SpaceBar to Jump. 
  • Hold SpaceBar to Jump Higher

Health/Stamina

  • You have a Stamina and Health bar.
  • The Stamina Bar depletes over time.
  • A yellow cherry can increase Stamina
  • Your Health will decrease if an enemy hits you
  •  A red cherry increases your Health.

Get all those presents and books now!!

From the Developer:

Thank you SO much for getting here and trying this out! I've been learning code and pixel art (zero prior experience) for about 3 weeks now, and thought I'd share my first EVER game here. I hope you enjoy it. Please leave a comment on what you liked as well as didn't like. I hope to really grow in this little "hobby" now. Enjoy and don't forget to live in the.... present :) . 

  • Artwork, coding, music by me. 
  • A couple SFX from OpenGameArt.org. 
  • HUGE thanks to Blackthornprod (one of the character names is Noa), Brackeys and GamesPlusJames for all the tutorials.
